package.name: coaliron_16ton_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Coal Iron 16-ton Hydraulic Forging Press
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for the Coal Iron 16-ton Hydraulic Forging Press.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found online at https://coaliron.com/collections/hydraulic-forging-presses/products/16-ton-forging-press All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Adam Buynak
Toby Mahan
Tal Yankevich
package.maintainer: Adam Buynak (AIMS Lab @ The Ohio State University)
